title: Steve's Carpet Business, Comedy Roulette, Things Steve Hates, Favorite Gifts and more.
itunes:title: Steve's Carpet Business, Comedy Roulette, Things Steve Hates, Favorite Gifts and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! This is The Steve Harvey Morning Show in your mouth. Merry Christmas Eve to you and yours!!! Steve shares with us his favorite Christmas memories and holiday traditions. Steve shares with us his favorite Christmas memories and holiday traditions. Who out there has a "You take this job and shove it!" story? Steve has one for us. Do you know the things that people say when they didn't get what they want for Christmas? Uncle Steve tells us the stuff that he is tired of seeing. We ask the crew about the best Christmas gifts that they have ever received. Fool #2 murders one specifically for all the men in the friend zone. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog simply wants us to get critical about our happiness.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
